message: I'd like to toggle minimalist  (fullscreen) display, so for example while viewing a topic, I can only see online members, recent topics and posts in my current topic. Idea of a toggle option is to give up some clicking efficiency in favor or maximum info presentation, when needed. On my 1024 pixel netbook, removing the convore, feedback, and about bars would give me a +20% more room in the thread pane. maybe the essential parts of those elements can be condensed under recent topics?
This might go a long way towards a universal mobile interface too...
